pkgmetadata.longdescription: Realtime Audio Mixer for Python===============================.. warning:: This is work in progress!Goal: Reliable low-latency audio playback and recording with Python, usingPortAudio_ via the sounddevice_ module.The audio callback is implemented in C (and compiled with the help of CFFI_)and doesn't invoke the Python interpreter, therefore avoiding waiting for thingslike garbage collection and the GIL.All PortAudio platforms and host APIs are supported.Runs on any Python version where CFFI is available.Online documentation https://python-rtmixer.readthedocs.io/Source code repository https://github.com/spatialaudio/python-rtmixerSomewhat similar projects * https://github.com/nwhitehead/swmixer * https://github.com/nvahalik/PyAudioMixer * http://www.pygame.org/docs/ref/mixer.html.. _PortAudio: http://portaudio.com/.. _sounddevice: https://python-sounddevice.readthedocs.io/.. _CFFI: https://cffi.readthedocs.io/
